event: construction of an end-to-side anastomosis of the donor portal vein to the superior mesenteric vein
massive venous bleeding from local varices
stenosis of the bile duct anastomosis
recurrent stenosis of the biliary anastomosis
treatment with pegylated interferon and ribavirin
admitted to the intensive care unit
chronic obliteration of the iliac conduit
partial perfusion of the hepatic artery by gastroduodenal collaterals
